mothers_letter.speaker: Narrator
mothers_letter.text: A letter arrives on a quiet morning. The handwriting is familiar - it's from your mother.

letter_content.speaker: Mother
letter_content.text: My dear child, I'm afraid I must ask something of you. My health has taken a turn, and I can no longer run the cafe. Would you consider taking over Dragon Haven?

letter_2.speaker: Mother
letter_2.text: I know it's a lot to ask. But this place... it's special. More special than you know. There's something in the storage cellar I've been protecting for years.

choices.text: Of course, Mother. I'll take care of it.

accept_positive.speaker: Mother
accept_positive.text: Thank you, my dear. I knew I could count on you. Your kindness has always been your greatest strength.

accept_humble.speaker: Mother
accept_humble.text: That's all I ask. The cafe has a way of bringing out the best in people. You'll find your footing.

travel_to_cafe.speaker: Narrator
travel_to_cafe.text: After a long journey, you arrive at Dragon Haven Cafe. The building is cozy, nestled between rolling hills and ancient trees.

cafe_arrival.speaker: Narrator
cafe_arrival.text: The door creaks open. Inside, dust motes dance in the afternoon light. Everything is just as you remember from childhood visits.

end_arrival.speaker: Narrator
end_arrival.text: A new chapter begins. Welcome to Dragon Haven Cafe.
